The HCC Coleman College Shining Star Award Goes To...

  • 07 May 2013
  • articles, awards, and life

Today, I received the 2013 Shining Star Award. This is a tremendous honor.

I was shocked to have been called on stage during our annual Employee Recognition Luncheon to accept the award. I can't even begin to express how honored I am to have received this award. Nuts. It's just nuts. Also, my face hurts from smiling.
